div.div:
This application is a key part of the admission process. Complete and accurate answers to the questions are, therefore, extremely important. Incomplete or false information will adversely affect your chances of selection.
Any admission granted on the basis of false information will be cancelled.
Please ensure that your telephone and mobile numbers, Email and postal address are correct and updated.
Photograph Specification
Your photo is a vital part of your application. Please follow these instructions carefully. If photographs received do not meet these requirements your application will be considered incomplete.
A color photo is required.
The photograph should be on a plain white/blue background.
The photo should have been taken within the last 1 week to reflect your current appearance.
The photo should show a clear, front view, full face of the person. Side or angled views are NOT acceptable.
Snapshots, magazine photos, low quality vending machine or mobile phone photos and full length photographs are not acceptable.

img.src: ./Candidate Profile – Online Admission System, IBA Karachi_files/no-image.gif

div.class: mb-2 mt-2 file file btn btn-md btn-primary

form.div: Only photos with jpg/jpeg extensions are allowed upto 5 MB file size.

div.div:
Mobile Number *
Your Mobile No. is not verified. Resend code.

div.label: Current Residential Address (If different from postal address)

select.name: country
select.option: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

div.label: Have you studied / studying at the IBA? *

div.p: For admissions queries please contact us at 92-21-38104701 Ext: 2324/2376, Email: admission@iba.edu.pk
If you are facing any difficulty in the form, drop an email at aasoomro@iba.edu.pk for technical assistance.
